mapper.select: select a.patid as "PatId",--系统自增加id a.cardid as "CardId",--身份证ID a.blcode as "BlCode",--病历号 a.name as "Name",--病人姓名 a.typeyb as "Typeyb",--医保类型 a.codeyb as "Codeyb",--医保代码 a.sex as "Sex",-- 性别 a.agetype as "AgeType",--年龄标识 a.age as "Age",--年龄 a.birthday as "Birthday",--出生年月 a.height as "Height",--身高（cm） a.weight as "Weight",--体重（kg） a.address as "Address",--家庭住址 a.telphone as "Telphone" --联系电话 from SI_MSPATINFO_MZ a,SI_MSSYINFO_MZ b where a.orgcode=b.orgcode and a.blcode=b.blcode and a.orgcode =#{map.Hoscode} and b.gendate>=to_char(#{map.beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gendate<=to_char(#{map.endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
